about_the_game:
If you already own Zenith: The Last City, do not buy this.

Unleash your inner warrior, rise up as an agent of Zenith: The Last City!

Fly, Slash, and Cast your way to glory as you explore the massive online world of Zenith with tons of players. Team up with friends to tackle perilous dungeons, compete in PVP, or just explore a gorgeous anime world together with a random stranger.

Play the most popular VR MMO game, with hundreds of hours of content including epic boss battles and sick loot + 3 amazing classes to play.


Party up, make friends and join guilds to defeat world bosses and epic dungeons together. Build a new life in the most fully realized online VR world ever constructed.


Deflect your enemy's cold steel with a parry, unleash magical abilities to take down opponents from a distance, sneak up behind your enemies in stealth and even slow down time to dodge incoming arrows.


Immerse yourself in beautiful worlds, from peaceful ocean side towns to towering mountain peaks. Climb, Grapple Hook, or Glide through the air to explore faraway places.


In Zenith, your class does not limit your role - play as a Tanking Essence Mage, DPS Cyber Ninja, or a Healing Blade Master at any time. The game is designed to offer refreshing combinations to suit each person's play style.


Catch and collect creatures as pets to explore the vast open world alongside you. Enjoy the perks that come with their companionship and show off adorable creatures to your friends!


Customize your own home with a variety of furnishings and decorations, creating a personal sanctuary in the VR open-world. Invite friends over for parties or simply enjoy some quiet time away from the hustle and bustle of the game.

short_description: If you already own Zenith: The Last City, do not buy this. Fight, craft, explore, and lose yourself in a massively multiplayer world built for VR. Forge alliances and friendships in guilds and parties. Join epic raids and world events, and blaze your own path. How will you use your power?
